description: Gets usage details (for example, data storage) about a particular identity pool. This API can only be called with developer credentials. You cannot call this API with the temporary user credentials provided by Cognito Identity.

return_structure.name: IdentityPoolUsage
return_structure.description: (dict) --- Response to a successful DescribeIdentityPoolUsage request.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolUsage
nested_items.description: A name-spaced GUID (for example, us-east-1:23EC4050-6AEA-7089-A2DD-08002EXAMPLE) created by Amazon Cognito. GUID generation is unique within a region.
